name: Jvicivs Corpvs
description:
Ancient "science" of humoralism foretold that the human body contains 4 different juices, also known as body fluids, these are; Phlegm, Yellow Bile, Black Bile and Blood. Any physical or mental sickness is due to an imbalance or leak of thise juices. Therefore, you sire, must keep the juices in balance!

Each player is responsible for a vital organ, controlled through an android device. If one organ (a player) fails, the body can still struggle on to stay alive, but if two vital organs fails, the body will die immediately.

Each organ produces a certain juice, for an example the lever produces blood, but all organs need all four kinds of juices to work. Therefore the organs need to share juices and cooperate in order to keep the balance of the juices!

The status of the cooperatively controlled poor human body is displayed on a common screen through Chrome Cast.
